bug.description:
Unsure if this is related to some of the other issues filed, but I'm having a problem with whitespace. Here, two instances of '
' in some messy email text are tokenized and tagged as nouns. This is spaCy 0.99 <denchmark-code>In [27]: from spacy.en import English
In [28]: nlp = English()
In [29]: d = nlp(u'hi Aaron,

How is your schedule today, I was wondering if you had time for a phone
call this afternoon?


')
In [30]: [(x.orth_, x.pos_) for x in d] Out[32]: [(u'hi', u'INTJ'), (u'Aaron', u'NOUN'), (u',', u'PUNCT'), (u'

', u'NOUN'), <------- Issue (u'How', u'ADV'), (u'is', u'VERB'), (u'your', u'ADJ'), (u'schedule', u'NOUN'), (u'today', u'NOUN'), (u',', u'PUNCT'), (u'I', u'NOUN'), (u'was', u'VERB'), (u'wondering', u'VERB'), (u'if', u'ADP'), (u'you', u'NOUN'), (u'had', u'VERB'), (u'time', u'NOUN'), (u'for', u'ADP'), (u'a', u'DET'), (u'phone', u'NOUN'), (u'
', u'NOUN'), <------- Issue (u'call', u'NOUN'), (u'this', u'DET'), (u'afternoon', u'NOUN'), (u'?', u'PUNCT'), (u'


', u'X')] </denchmark-code>
